hero_description: Host unforgettable gatherings in an elegant setting.
private_text: Luminary offers four private dining rooms and  one private outdoor seating arrangement for individuals, couples, or small groups, catering  to gatherings of any kind, including special  dates, anniversaries, social gatherings,  family reunions, and more.
hosting_text:
Luminary caters to gatherings of any kind, including corporate events, family reunions, anniversaries, wedding parties, community events, and more with exclusive access to our main indoor and outdoor dining spaces, and  four intimate dining rooms upon request.

To schedule private dining or an event, inquire at 
events@luminary.com, or click the link below.
